name: XX
greetingText: I feel so lucky to have met you, the most beautiful you, in the most beautiful years of my life
wishText: May your youthful beauty last forever, like flowers upon your hair, year after year. May your black hair never grow old, and may every year be filled with joy.
textInChatBox: Wishing you a very, very, very sincere Happy Birthday!!! Lots and lots of happiness…
text2: I want to give you a surprise
text3: I thought about it very seriously for a long time
text4: I realized that I want to do something
text5Content: you are very special to me
outroText: I hope you like this little surprise!
replayText: If you like it, you can watch it again! Or…
